hotelInformation.name: Grant Hotel Subang
hotelInformation.address: Jalan Jendral Achmad Yani No. 6 Kota Subang Subang Indonesia
hotelInformation.description:
About Grant Hotel Subang

For you, travelers who wish to travel comfortably on a budget, Grant Hotel Subang is the perfect place to stay that provides decent facilities as well as great services.

Whether you are planning an event or other special occasions, Grant Hotel Subang is a great choice for you with a large and well-equipped function room to suit your requirements.

When staying at a hotel, the design and architecture are two important factors that can spoil your eyes. With its unique setting, Grant Hotel Subang provides a pleasant accommodation for your stay.

From business event to corporate gathering, Grant Hotel Subang provides complete services and facilities that you and your colleagues need.

Have fun with various entertaining facilities for you and the whole family at Grant Hotel Subang, a wonderful accommodation for your family holiday.

If you plan to have a long-term stay, staying at Grant Hotel Subang is the right choice for you. Providing wide range of facilities and great service quality, this accommodation certainly makes you feel at home.

While traveling with friends can be a lot of fun, traveling solo has its own perks. As for the accommodation, Grant Hotel Subang is suitable for you who value privacy during your stay.

Splendid service together with wide range of facilities provided will make you complain for nothing during your stay at Grant Hotel Subang.

24-hours front desk is available to serve you, from check-in to check-out, or any assistance you need. Should you desire more, do not hesitate to ask the front desk, we are always ready to accommodate you.

Savor your favorite dishes with special cuisines from Grant Hotel Subang exclusively for you.

WiFi is available within public areas of the property to help you to stay connected with family and friends.

Grant Hotel Subang is a hotel with great comfort and excellent service according to most hotel's guests.

With all facilities offered, Grant Hotel Subang is the right place to stay.
